statements: SELECT * FROM supply_chain_financial_reports
SELECT report_id, cost_data FROM supply_chain_financial_reports WHERE revenue_data > 1000
SELECT report_id, cost_data, revenue_data FROM supply_chain_financial_reports WHERE cost_data < 500
SELECT report_id, revenue_data FROM supply_chain_financial_reports ORDER BY revenue_data DESC
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_financial_reports WHERE cost_data > revenue_data
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_financial_reports WHERE cost_data > revenue_data
SELECT report_id, revenue_data, cost_data FROM supply_chain_financial_reports ORDER BY report_id DESC
SELECT report_id, cost_data, revenue_data FROM supply_chain_financial_reports WHERE cost_data < 5000
SELECT report_id, SUM(cost_data) AS total_cost FROM supply_chain_financial_reports GROUP BY report_id
SELECT report_id, AVG(revenue_data) AS avg_revenue FROM supply_chain_financial_reports
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_costs;
SELECT cost_description, cost_amount FROM supply_chain_costs WHERE cost_amount > 1000;
SELECT MAX(cost_amount) AS highest_cost FROM supply_chain_costs;
SELECT MIN(cost_amount) AS lowest_cost FROM supply_chain_costs WHERE cost_category = 'Processing';
SELECT supply_chain_cost_id, cost_category, cost_amount FROM supply_chain_costs ORDER BY cost_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_costs WHERE cost_category = 'Shipping' ORDER BY cost_amount DESC;
SELECT cost_category, AVG(cost_amount) AS average_cost FROM supply_chain_costs GROUP BY cost_category;
SELECT revenue_id, product_name, profit_margin FROM revenue_data WHERE sales_amount > 5000 ORDER BY profit_margin DESC, sales_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_costs WHERE cost_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY cost_amount;
SELECT cost_category, SUM(cost_amount) AS total_cost FROM supply_chain_costs GROUP BY cost_category HAVING total_cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_costs;
SELECT product_name, cost_amount FROM supply_chain_costs WHERE cost_amount > 100;
SELECT report_date, total_costs, total_revenue FROM financial_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(cost_amount) AS total_cost FROM supply_chain_costs GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_cost > 500;
SELECT product_name, revenue_amount FROM revenue_data WHERE revenue_amount < 1000 ORDER BY revenue_amount DESC;
SELECT cost_id, product_name, cost_amount FROM supply_chain_costs WHERE cost_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_costs WHERE product_name = 'Widget' ORDER BY cost_amount DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, (total_revenue - total_costs) AS profit FROM financial_reports WHERE total_revenue > total_costs;
SELECT * FROM revenue_data WHERE revenue_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT product_name, SUM(revenue_amount) AS total_revenue FROM revenue_data GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_revenue > 5000;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_costs WHERE cost_type = 'Shipping';
SELECT id, revenue_type, revenue_amount FROM revenue_data ORDER BY revenue_amount DESC;
SELECT report_name, total_cost, total_revenue FROM financial_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, log_type, log_timestamp FROM integration_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, cost_type, cost_amount, DATE_FORMAT(cost_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM supply_chain_costs;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_costs WHERE cost_type = 'Manufacturing' AND cost_amount > 5000 ORDER BY cost_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT report_name, report_date, total_cost FROM financial_reports WHERE total_cost > total_revenue;
SELECT log_type, log_description FROM integration_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, revenue_type, revenue_amount FROM revenue_data WHERE revenue_amount < 1000 OR revenue_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT id, cost_type, cost_amount, cost_date FROM supply_chain_costs WHERE cost_date >= '2022-01-01' AND cost_date <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_costs;
SELECT cost_description, cost_amount FROM supply_chain_costs ORDER BY cost_amount DESC;
SELECT revenue_category, revenue_amount FROM revenue_data WHERE revenue_amount > 1000;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM financial_reports WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM report_date) = 6;
SELECT summary_description, total_value FROM report_summaries WHERE total_value BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY total_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_costs ORDER BY cost_amount DESC;
SELECT cost_description, cost_amount FROM supply_chain_costs WHERE cost_amount > 1000;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM financial_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT revenue_category, revenue_amount FROM revenue_data WHERE revenue_amount < 500 AND revenue_category LIKE '%Sales%';
SELECT summary_description, total_value FROM report_summaries ORDER BY summary_id ASC;
